import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import '../stylesheet/sidebar.css' import { useAuth0 } from '@auth0/auth0-react' export default function Sidebar({navBarState,setClickGallery}) { const {isAuthenticated,logout} = useAuth0() const data = [ { className:"bx-grid-alt",value:"Dashboard",link:'/'}, { className:"bx-user",value:"Profile",link:'/profile'}, { className:"bx-bar-chart-alt-2",value:"Statistic",link:'/statistics'} ] return ( <>
Inventory Check
{ data.map((item,index) =>{ if(index === 0){ return {item.value} } else{ return {item.value} } }) }
{isAuthenticated ? logout()}> Sign Out : ""}
) }
